participant_1.background:
I enjoy trying new things and my favorite foods are sushi and pizza.
i never eat veggies.
i prefer baseball over football.
I spent a lot of time last year listening to The Muggers and trying to produce music myself.
i am gay but i have not told my parents yet.

participant_2.background:
I do my best to keep up with my family, although it's hard to stay connected with everyone when you're working all the time.
I don't care much about the weather, as long as my dog is happy.
I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
I had to learn how to cook without shrimp because of my shellfish allergy.
i will be on bed rest for the next 5 months.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
I just played a concert last night, it was so much fun!
Wow, that sounds awesome! What kind of music do you play?
I'm a singer-songwriter, I mostly play indie folk.
Oh cool, I love indie folk! What's your favorite band?
I really like The Decemberists, their music is so beautiful.
I've heard of them, I'll have to check them out. What's your favorite song by them?
I really like "The Crane Wife". It's so hauntingly beautiful.
I'll definitely have to listen to that one!
I also really like "The Tain". It's a really long song, but it's so worth it.
Cool, I'll check that one out too.
Oh, and I just remembered that you said you liked sushi. I love sushi too!
Yeah, I love it! What's your favorite kind?
I love salmon sushi, but I also really like tuna and shrimp.
I love all of those too! I also like octopus sushi, but I know that's not everyone's cup of tea.
Oh yeah, I've never had octopus sushi, but I've heard it's good.
It is! It's kind of chewy, but it has a really good flavor.
I'll have to try it sometime.
You definitely should!
Thanks for the recommendation
